DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate new technology include new PCA-9000A PET/CT System .
DOC.brief_title: Verification Quantitative Accuracy PET/CT System Imaging Chain
DOC.detailed_description: Scope : To evaluate new technology include PCA-9000A PET/CT System , study follow 3 goal . - Define confirm support clinical protocol Low-Dose CT , PET acquisition presentation . - Verification quantitative accuracy image chain . - Evaluate performance stability new system related quality control calibration procedure . Result ( Expected ) : The study essential step assess quality hardware software define new PCA-9000A PET/CT System . Several essential parameter acquisition , reconstruction , correction , filtering , presentation estimate adjusted period . The evaluation confirm PCA-9000A PET/CT System effective intend use .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Patients already schedule FDG test SDMI 40 year old Adult must able sign inform consent form Exclusion Patients schedule FDG test SDMI 39 year young Pregnant adult female plan pregnant Adult unable sign inform consent
